breakLeaves.comment: Cuts down leaves aswell, true to enable, false to disable. Default: true.

reverse.comment: Reverses the control of sneaking, if false then sneaking and chopping will disable the Timber Mod, if true then it's in reverse. Default: false.

breakLeavesLimit.comment: Limit to how many leaves that will be cut down. Default: 300.

damageAxe.comment: Will damage the axe with the amount of logs chopped, true to enable, false to disable. Default: true.

dropItems.comment: Timber Mod will drop items in creative mode aswell, true to enable, false to disable. Default: false.
